activities: eWork is a software company that provides hosed software solutions to Global 2000 organizations. Global companies use eWork's application to procure and source temporary workers for their needs. Typical information we receive from EU countries includes the name of the temporary worker, hourly rate charged, dates of availability, location and certifications or educational background.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Iceland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Computer Services - (CSV)Health Care Services - (HCS)Employment Services - (EMP)
privacyprograms: eWork is fully complying with the priciples of the safe harbor of the US Department of Commerce. We provide security safeguards to protect customer information. Multiple sercurity layers including sensor and host based intrusion detection along with firewalls protects all customer data.
recoursemech:
eWork will cooperate and comply with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs). 
eWork's privacy policy conforms to the safe harbor principles.
